column4: running ubuntu 10.04 on an msi laptop with intel hda soundcard. i have sound on headphones and on external speaker. but not on speakers on laptop. i used alsaupdatescript to install alsa but no success. i need an idea what to do next ...
i had the same problem with a compaq, adding 'options snd-hda-intel' to the bottom of /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf fixed it for me
